name: dlpintegreat-apps
description: Perfios Digital Lending Platform  - Powered by InteGREAT
author: BOI UI team, Perfios Software

scripts.buildTlad: npm run encryptConfig dlp-term-deposit-booking && ng build --project=dlp-term-deposit-booking --configuration production --build-optimizer=true
scripts.buildKcc: npm run encryptConfig dlp-kisan-credit-card && ng build --project=dlp-kisan-credit-card --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href='/kisan-credit-card/'
scripts.buildSba: npm run encryptConfig dlp-saving-account && ng build --project=dlp-saving-account --configuration production  --optimization false --build-optimizer=true  --base-href='/savings-account/'
scripts.buildCc: npm run encryptConfig dlp-credit-card && ng build --project=dlp-credit-card --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href='/credit-card/'
scripts.buildGold: npm run encryptConfig dlp-gold-loan && ng build --project=dlp-gold-loan --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href='/gold-loan/'
scripts.buildPl: npm run encryptConfig dlp-personal-loan && ng build --project=dlp-personal-loan --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /personal-loan/
scripts.buildVl: npm run encryptConfig dlp-vehicle-loan && ng build --project=dlp-vehicle-loan --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /vehicle-loan/
scripts.buildVlDigi: npm run encryptConfig dlp-vehicle-loan-digital && ng build --project=dlp-vehicle-loan-digital --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /star-digi-vehicle-loan/
scripts.buildPmmy: npm run encryptConfig dlp-pmmy-mudra-loans && ng build --project=dlp-pmmy-mudra-loans --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /pmmy/
scripts.buildKml: npm run encryptConfig dlp-pmmy-mudra-loans && ng build --project=dlp-pmmy-mudra-loans --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /kishore-mudra/
scripts.buildMsme: npm run encryptConfig dlp-msme-renewal && ng build --project=dlp-msme-renewal --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /msme-renewal/
scripts.buildBl: npm run encryptConfig dlp-business-loan && ng build --project=dlp-business-loan --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /business-loan/
scripts.buildKccRenewal: npm run encryptConfig dlp-kcc-renewal && ng build --project=dlp-kcc-renewal --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /kcc-renewal/
scripts.buildNsc: npm run encryptConfig dlp-national-savings-certificate && ng build --project=dlp-national-savings-certificate --configuration production  --optimization false --build-optimizer=true  --base-href='/nsc/'
scripts.buildPpf: npm run encryptConfig dlp-public-provident-fund && ng build --project=dlp-public-provident-fund --configuration production  --optimization false --build-optimizer=true  --base-href='/ppf/'
scripts.buildSsa: npm run encryptConfig dlp-sukanya-samriddhi-account && ng build --project=dlp-sukanya-samriddhi-account --configuration production  --optimization false --build-optimizer=true  --base-href='/ssa/'
scripts.buildCa: npm run encryptConfig dlp-current-account && ng build --project=dlp-current-account --configuration production  --optimization false --build-optimizer=true  --base-href='/current-account/'
scripts.buildHl: npm run encryptConfig dlp-home-loan && ng build --project=dlp-home-loan --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /home-loan/
scripts.buildTl: npm run encryptConfig dlp-topup-loan && ng build --project=dlp-topup-loan --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /top-up-loan/
scripts.buildTml: npm run encryptConfig dlp-pmmy-mudra-loans && ng build --project=dlp-pmmy-mudra-loans --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /tarun-mudra/
scripts.buildFd: npm run encryptConfig dlp-fixed-deposit && ng build --project=dlp-fixed-deposit --configuration production  --optimization false --build-optimizer=true  --base-href='/fixed-deposit/'
scripts.serveSba: npm run encryptConfig dlp-saving-account && ng serve --project=dlp-saving-account --port=4200
scripts.serveCc: npm run encryptConfig dlp-credit-card && ng serve --project=dlp-credit-card --port=4200
scripts.serveGold: npm run encryptConfig dlp-gold-loan && ng serve --project=dlp-gold-loan --port=4200
scripts.serveFd: npm run encryptConfig dlp-fixed-deposit && ng serve --project=dlp-fixed-deposit --port=4200
scripts.buildKccAh: npm run encryptConfig dlp-kcc-ah && ng build --project=dlp-kcc-ah --configuration production --build-optimizer=true --base-href /kcc-ah/
